list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: add support for Jira Server and enhanced AI test generation
### Configuration Changes (package.json) - Add jiraServerType setting to choose between Jira Cloud/Server - Add separate authentication for Jira Cloud (email + apiToken) - Add separate authentication for Jira Server (username + password) - Add gemini.model setting with pro/flash model selection - Set gemini-1.5-flash-latest as default model
### AI Service Enhancements (aiService.ts) - Add testType parameter support for Web/API specific test generation - Implement contextual prompt system based on test type - Add intelligent test case quantity (1-2 simple, 3-4 medium, 5-6 complex) - Update test case format to include TIPO field - Add Gemini model selection support via -m parameter - Implement comprehensive debug logging for response parsing - Add fallback parsing mechanism for improved reliability
### Breaking Changes - generateTestCases() method signature updated with optional testType - New required configuration fields for Jira Server support
### Technical Improvements - Enhanced markdown cleanup in test case parsing - Robust error handling with detailed logging - Modular prompt system for extensibility - Atomic and well-defined test case generation

task.summary: feat: api call integrated, no need for backend
feat: comments to jira done, ui checkbox fix
feat: -variable names of TestCase interface fixed. -Local variable issue redundant fixed. -package.json fixed
feat: gemini integrated, min words for description of the test case added, logo added, parse test-case improved

### AI Service Enhancements (aiService.ts) - Add testType parameter support for Web/API specific test generation - Implement contextual prompt system based on test type - Add intelligent test case quantity (1-2 simple, 3-4 medium, 5-6 complex) - Update test case format to include TIPO field - Add Gemini model selection support via -m parameter - Implement comprehensive debug logging for response parsing - Add fallback parsing mechanism for improved reliability
### Breaking Changes - generateTestCases() method signature updated with optional testType - New required configuration fields for Jira Server support
### Technical Improvements - Enhanced markdown cleanup in test case parsing - Robust error handling with detailed logging - Modular prompt system for extensibility - Atomic and well-defined test case generation
